fee.label: Price
fee.description: if paid for Part I and II

item.description:
It seems at times that our life's journey is similar to a hike in the woods.

You are moving, but you are not sure if you are going in the right direction or you feel stuck at a fork in the road, and you wish you could have a map to clarify things. Time flies, and you're still procrastinating about making the decision to make a decision in terms of your first step. The feelings during such times could range from excitement to despair, curiosity to hopelessness, and definitely there is frustration.


Wouldn't it be helpful to be able to fly up and look at where you are going? Wouldn't it be helpful to sketch some kind of "map" of your life?

"Life mapping" is a simple left-brain "tool" designed by Toni and Robbie Fanning to "fly above" and see your life's journey map.

This mapping strategy allows you to clarify your life intentions, make goals or plans and organize your creative right-brain ideas into left-brain steps to make them real.

Real results are satisfying and create the motivation to move forward and explore new areas in "the woods" of your life journey. 

Please come to this meetup to create your "life map", meditate to access your heart's desires and work on an inspiring collage that will support and encourage you in achieving your fulfilling goals.

------------
Life Mapping includes 2 classes. I - Directions to Fulfillment   II. Finding Time and Energy.

Time: 7pm-9pm
Your full payment for the two meetings is $40.00.
If you decide to register for only one meeting, the price is $25.00.
I hope to see you soon!
item.why: Life Mapping is an interesting "tool" to learn about your own life.
item.name: Life Mapping: Your Directions to Fulfillment
